ai-ya3.3.6:1.1_0: Since the eye is completely understood, they will not sorrow.
ai-ya3.3.6:2.1_0: Would he whose sense fields completely understand the dimension of infinite space?
ai-ya3.3.6:3.1_0: and his eye are not imagined by the eye, nor will they become a solid.
ai-ya3.3.6:4.1_0: While the wheels will blow, they won’t completely understand the dimension of infinite space, the field of field,
ai-ya3.3.6:4.1_1: While the best path, they don’t get attached to their eyes, and they won’t fail them in the sense fields.
ai-ya3.3.6:5.1_0: and not the sense fields of the eye, are they’ll fail?
ai-ya3.3.6:6.1_0: But he’s perfected ones, but doesn’t see clearly.
ai-ya3.3.6:6.1_1: While the best path, they don’t arrive at the wrong path, and they won’t fail them in his eyes with tuskers.
ai-ya3.3.6:8.1_0: The Book of the Fields is finished.
